channel.title: [Project Insanity] - How to use the information box thingy
channel.description:
Okay, so i was running through my server files yesterday and stumbled upon something. It's in the DialogueHandler.java.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/mu94l2.png[/img]
How exactly does the information box thing work?
How do i add one to the game? Please help. :S

Like where it says login messages in class Client

item.title: [Project Insanity] - How to use the information box thingy
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

c.getDH().sendStartInfo("Text", "Text1", "Text2", "Text3", "Title");

Or for a more intelligent method design

public static void methodNameHere(String title, String... text) throws IllegalArgumentException {
    if (title == null) {
        throw new IllegalArgumentException("title cannot be null");
        // Or you can default to a blank title here if you want
    }
    if (text.length < 0 || text.length > 5) {
        throw new IllegalArgumentException("varargs text must contain [0..5] arguments: " + text.length);
    }
    // NOTE: You may need to alter this a bit because of the way RS does interfaces
    final int start = 6180;
    for (int i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
        c.getPA().sendFrame126(text[i], start + i);
    }
    c.getPA().sendFrame164(6179);
}

Read full topic
